comments.content:
I've reviewed the code base and nova.api.openstack.compute.tenant_networks is the only one which still raises HTTPBadRequest error (400) instead of HTTPForbidden (403) as quota exceeded.

In nova.exception, QuotaError uses code 413 which is inherited by the folliwng over quota errors:

TooManyInstances
FloatingIpLimitExceeded
FixedIpLimitExceeded
MetadataLimitExceeded
OnsetFileLimitExceeded
KeypairLimitExceeded
SecurityGroupLimitExceeded
PortLimitExceeded

Should I leave it as 413 in nova.exception for now?
